page.title: 09PRIVATE TRANSPORT
page.content: There are many different kinds of transport like car,bus,bicycle,and motor cycles.Cars are often used for getting people to work and most people have a car some people even have two.Cars are also used for trips to various places at the weekends and for holidays.They are also used for going shopping to lincoln or to Asda.Bikes are also used for the same reason.They are also used to give you excercise and fresh air.A bike is cheaper to buy and run and all ages can ride them and there are so many kinds of bikes that they can be used for sport as well as transport.They can be used for liesure and for competision and not many people in our school have horses but there is some in fields around our area.Few people use horses for transport they are normaly used for sport or leisure.
